description:
"Yeah, I've thought about it," Topher admitted when asked about whether or not he's ever fantasized about having his big dick sucked by a dude.
And there was Barry, with his enormous, muscular arms, sitting right next to him with a big smile on his face.

As it turns out, Barry is also quite good at rimming tight, hairy assholes and he's even better at sucking off hot straight cock!
title: Blowing Topher
